HomePage.subheadline: Mobile, web, and cybersecurity expertise for teams that want to lead.

AboutPage.title: About InterZone Technologies
AboutPage.description: InterZone Technologies LLC was founded to empower communities through innovative technology. We specialize in building modern, scalable web and mobile apps, as well as cybersecurity services. Our flagship InterZone app connects people locally and globally.
AboutPage.closing: We believe technology can bring people together. Let’s build the future of community—together!

WorkPage.title: Our Work
WorkPage.intro: Discover how InterZone is connecting communities through an intuitive mobile app designed to bring local events, businesses, and people together.

captions.login: Secure and intuitive login for quick access
captions.home: Your personalized feed with citywide posts & events
captions.profile: Manage your profile and view your activity
captions.post: Create and share posts with the local community
captions.report: Report issues or events for community safety
captions.music: Discover local music and upcoming concerts

project.title: InterZone Mobile App
project.description: A city-focused social platform to share posts, events, and experiences with your local community — built with React Native and Firebase.
